bikes.title: S-Works Turbo Levo
bikes.description: The all-new Levo delivers the unbelievable power to ride more trails through an unequaled combination of ride quality, usable power, and ride anywhere range.

bikes.title: S-Works Turbo Kenevo SL
bikes.description: Power up to trail riding’s next level and dominate any and all trail monsters—the Turbo Kenevo Super Light melds the legendary handling and all-around big trail prowess of the Enduro with our Super Light electric support.

bikes.title: S-Works Epic EVO
bikes.description: You know what they say—when the grams go away, speed comes out to play. Benefitting from the lightest EVO frame we’ve ever created and the most aggressive iteration of our Progressive XC Geometry to date.
